name: Arrival - A Halloween Game
description:
Wasn't able to make the full Halloween game I wanted to this year,  so made a short Twine IF in about 1 and a half to 2 hours to celebrate instead.

There are four endings, enjoy.

Credit to Sinister fonts for the font in the logo.

Thanks to all my patrons for their patience considering it's been forever since my last release:

Connor Donnan

Rob Small

Miles Winzeler

RedSA

Zap Fernandez

Check out my Patreon!: https://www.patreon.com/cameronhgamedev

(N.B. The title is a cute reference to my last Halloween game: Escape - A Halloween Game)
